text:
RT @alanfeuer: As protesters start a 6th night
Mayor de Blasio: “The complexities our officers deal with are unimaginable.”
Bronx Councilman: “The city was largely reactive, almost blindsided." 
City detective: “It seems like we have lost control...There’s no direction.”
